title: Object-Oriented Software Engineering: A Use Case Driven Approach
This book describes successful guidelines and methods (Object-Oriented Software Engineering, or OOSE) for developing large-scale software systems

note: such as complex number support, locales, and input/output streams.
title: The C++ Standard Library: A Tutorial and Reference
This book describes the STL as well as other C++ library features
Upper Saddle River
This book is a self-teaching guide to the Unified Modeling Language, and it includes a review of C++ fundamentals
Object-Oriented Modeling and Design
This book presents and explores the Object Modeling Technique (OMT), a method for breaking problems into suitable objects
The Design and Evolution of C++
If you're interested in learning how C++ evolved and why it is the way it is, read this book
